title: Functions) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 418 of 2011)) of the Education (Miscellaneous
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Miscellaneous Provisions)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Miscellaneous Provisions) 

Act 2007 (Vesting) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited education (miscellaneous provisions) act 2007 (vesting) order 2021

title: Functions) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 418 of 2011)) of the Education (Miscellaneous
heading: 2. The lands described in the Schedule together with all property relating
text_raw:
2. The lands described in the Schedule together with all property relating 
thereto whether real or personal and all rights, powers or privileges relating to 
or connected with such lands or property which in each case stands vested in 
Cork Education and Training Board on the 1st day of July 2021 shall on that 
day vest in the Commissioners of Public Works in Ireland. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [307] 3

title: Functions) Order 2011 (S.I. No. 418 of 2011)) of the Education (Miscellaneous
heading: Crawford Art Gallery, Emmet Place in the City of Cork
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Crawford Art Gallery, Emmet Place in the City of Cork 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 June, 2021. 

NORMA FOLEY, 

Minister for Education.
